p: The annual average PM2.5 and PM10 concentration was estimated as the average of daily concentrations for the year 2016 of all grid points corresponding to the city. The impacts on anthropogenic emissions due to the restrictions applied during the COVID-19 pandemic have not yet been quantified and therefore the year 2020 could not be simulated for the present study. Therefore, a different year needed to be used and the year 2016 represents the best compromise between available observations and the absence of large emission events such as forest fires.
